comments.body: that does not test that func returned error. Just checks for len of slice.

The test case knows that GetNodeHostIPs returns an error XOR a non-empty slice, so the testcase struct does not have separate `expectIPs` and `expectError` fields. At this point we know that `err` is `nil` and `tc.expectIPs` is empty, so that means we expected an error and didn't get one, as the error message says.

So I think this is correct. If you want something changed please clarify what part of it
